Verses: 1 abiyaa Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapin, Avanai Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththil Adakkampanninaargal; Avan Sthaanaththile Avan Kumaaranaagiya Aasaa Raajaavaanaan; Ivanudaiya Naatkalil Dhesam Paththu Varushamattum Amarikkaiyaayirundhadhu.
2 aasaa Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Paarvaikku Nanmaiyum Semmaiyumaanadhai Seydhaan.
3 anniya Dhevargalin Palipeedangalaiyum Medaigalaiyum Agatri, Silaigalai Udaiththu, Vikkiragaththoppugalai Vetti,
4 thangal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaraith Thedavum, Nyaayappramaanaththinpadiyum Karpanaiyinpadiyum Seyyavum Yoodhaavukkuk Karpiththu,
5 yoodhaavudaiya Ellaap Pattanangalilumirundhu Medaigalaiyum Vikkiragangalaiyum Agatrinaan; Avanukku Munbaaga Raajyam Amarikkaiyaayirundhadhu.

6 karththar Avanukku Ilaippaarudhalaik Kattalaiyittadhinaal, Andha Varushangalil Avanukku Virodhamaana Yuththam Illaadhirundhadhu; Dhesam Amarikkaiyaayirundhapadiyinaal Yoodhaavile Aranaana Pattanangalaik Kattinaan.

7 avan Yoodhaavai Nokki: Dhesam Namakku Munbaaga Amarndhirukkaiyil, Naam Indhap Pattanangalaik Katti, Avaigalukku Alangangal, Koburangal, Vaasalgal Undupanni, Thaazhppaal Pottu Balappaduththuvomaaga; Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththaraith Thedinom, Thedinapodhu, Sutrilum Namakku Ilaippaarudhalaik Kattalaiyittaar Endraan; Appadiye Kattinaargal; Avargalukkuk Kaariyam Vaaiththadhu.

8 yoodhaavile Parisaiyum Eettiyum Pidikkira Moondrulatchamperum, Benyameenile Kedagam Pidiththu Villai Naanetrugira Irandulatchaththu Enbadhinaayiramperumaana Senai Aasaavukku Irundhadhu, Ivargalellaarum Paraakkiramasaaligal.
9 avargalukku Virodhamaaga Eththiyoppiyanaagiya Seraa Paththulatchampergal Serndha Senaiyodum Munnooru Radhangalodum Purappattu Maresaamattum Vandhaan.
10 appozhudhu Aasaa Avanukku Edhiraagap Purappattaan; Maresaavukku Aduththa Seppaththaa Ennum Pallaththaakkil Yuththaththirku Anivaguththu Nindraargal.

11 aasaa Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittu: Karththaave, Balamullavanukkaagilum Balanatravanukkaagilum Udhaviseygiradhu Umakku Lesaanakaariyam; Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Engalukkuth Thunainillum; Ummaichchaarndhu Ummudaiya Naamaththil Eraalamaana Indhak Koottaththirku Edhiraaga Vandhom;karththaave, Neer Engal Dhevan; Manushan Ummai Merkollavidaadheyum Endraan.
12 appozhudhu Karththar Andha Eththiyoppiyarai Aasaavukkum Yoodhaavukkummunbaaga Muriya Adiththadhinaal Eththiyoppiyar Odipponaargal.

13 avargalai Aasaavum Avanodirundha Janangalum Keraarmattum Thuraththinaargal; Eththiyoppiyar Thirumba Balankollaadhapadikku Murindhu Vizhundhaargal;karththarukkum Avarudaiya Senaikkum Munbaaga Norungipponaargal; Avargal Migudhiyaagak Kollai Adiththu,
14 keraarin Sutruppattanangalaiyellaam Muriya Adiththaargal; Karththaraal Avargalukku Bayangaram Undaayitru; Andhap Pattanangalaiyellaam Kollaiyittaargal, Avaigalil Kollai Migudhiyaai Agappattadhu.
15 mirugajeevangal Irundha Kottaarangalaiyum Avargal Idiththuppottu, Thiralaana Aadugalaiyum Ottagangalaiyum Saaiththukkondu Erusalemukkuth Thirumbinaargal.
